meanings.definition: A hybrid fruit resulting from a cross between a plum and an apricot.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a juicy pluot for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a special on pluots this week.
meanings.sent3: The pluot rolled off the table and onto the floor, making a funny sound.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweetness of a ripe pluot.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the pluot made it stand out among the other fruits.

meanings.sent1: The pluot tree in our backyard is full of blossoms.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new pluot tree in the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed the pluot tree and stole some fruit.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the pluot tree reached towards the sky like outstretched arms.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the pluot tree in bloom filled the air with sweetness.
